name: Hero Castle Wars
description:
Many monsters and enemies in the tower. You need to defeat them, get treasures and save hostages.
You can play everywhere ,every time. It is a boring killer game.

HOW TO PLAY:
1 - Kill all enemies
2 - Get more skill
3 - Increase your power
4 - Defend your tower

Collect all treasures and become the best hero in Hero castle Wars.

If you love the game. Give us your feedback: https://www.facebook.com/tutappgames

Enjoy your time.
